com.github.macgregor.alexandria

Class Jackson

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.macgregor.alexandria.Jackson

  • public class Jackson
extends Object
    Static configuration of the Jackson parser Used by Remote implementations for parsing json requests and responses as well as the saving/loading of the Alexandria Context.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Jackson.PathDeserializer
      Converts a string into a Path, which Jackson wasnt always handling gracefully.
      static class  Jackson.PathSerializer
      Converts a Path into a string, which Jackson wasnt always handling gracefully.
      static class  Jackson.ZonedDateTimeDeserializer
      Converts a string to a ZonedDateTime instance using a provided DateTimeFormatter
      static class  Jackson.ZonedDateTimeSerializer
      Converts a ZonedDateTime instance to a string using the provided DateTimeFormatter

      • configureMapper

        protected static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper configureMapper(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper mapper)
        Configure Jakson mapper with commong configurations; ignoring unknown properties, enable jdk8 feature, etc.
        Parameters:
        mapper - mapper to be configured
        Returns:
        mapper with configuration added

      • java8TimeModule

        protected static com.fasterxml.jackson.datatype.jsr310.JavaTimeModule java8TimeModule()
        Configure Java 8 time module to allow use of newer, better date time features. Also add the ZonedDateTime (de)serializers to the module.
        Returns:
        java time module configured to use zoned date times

      • pathModule

        protected static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.module.SimpleModule pathModule()
        Configure a new module for converting Path objects to/from JSON.
        Returns:
        configured module that converts paths
